item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Saturday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. North wind at 6 mph becoming south.



I cant go to the Kayak Jamboree nor list it since its too far away and i cant deal with crowded parking lots and traFfick again..IM SAVING THE PLANET THIS WAY...LOL,
If you are interested go the the SKG site for info.
http://www.meetup.com...

Besides, i have a local paddle event on Sunday on the Farmington River..
But it may rain..dont know yet..that means like last weekend..EVERYONE WANTS TO HIT THE ONLY BEACH DAY..LOL



This Event:

Here is a place to do some FREEEEEEE TUBING down a a fine river,
all you have to do is bring some flotation tube, raft or whatever,,(Maybe all you need is a big fat azz).


Tubes can be gotten from Walmart and the similar..

the cheap ones are ok, but get what you want..we most likely will return here on the 100 degree days..
Global warming ???


I DONT KNOW THE WEATHER YET.. BUT SO FAR ITS LOOKING GREAT.
AND I DONT WANT TO FIGHT BEACH TRAFFICK AGAIN LIKE LAST WEEK.

Bring some Pot Luck food & something for the Riverside Barbie-Q and wood for the after party fire. Leave it in you car till we have chosen a place (Either the existing fire pit or one we will make ).
Bring your favourite bugg juice too.

I HAVE SOME SCRAP WOOD AND A FAKE LOG I WILL BRING ALONG WITH THE NEW AND IMPROVED GRILL AND SOME OTHER STUFF IN THE FRIDGE, MAYBE FISH, DONT KNOW YET..LOL.



This is a Location that is prime for so many things, last summer it was a place for us to play in the water, tubing, and have a barbie -q a few times.

Its also a good walking trail along the river.

Driving and parking directions DIRECTIONS:

From Interstate 91 to the Scantic Rapids Parking lot

Take Exit 47 East. Go eastbound 2.7 miles on RT-190 (Hazard Avenue) from Enfield to Hazardville.

At intersection of RT-190 and North/South Maple (RT 192)

~~> turn right (South) onto South Maple.


Park in the Barn Parking Lot.

Walk over the bridge and look at the rapids area, I will stick the orange pole by the water or fire pit area,
you have to look a bit since this is a popular local's location also.


Hope to see you there..
al-r
